page.title: 17PAPER BOY OF PENRITH
page.content: The paper that I deliver is "The Evening News And Star".It is delivered from Carlisle by van at approximately 3:30 pm.When I get home from school the papers are on my doorstep.I take them in and count them to see if they have sent me the correct amount of papers.I then put them in my paper -bag and go out on my round.My round consists of:_ Canny Croft, Macadam Way Drovers Lane, Penny Hill Park, Raislands Croft,Monnington Way and Anchor Close.I deliever five nights a week,Monday,Tuesday,Wednesday,Thursday and Saturday.I also have to collect the money which is 16p per paper.Some people pay daily but some people pay weekly.The wage I get is about Â£4.50 a week and sometimes I get tips.
